channel.title: Need help with drop, [Future Bass]
channel.description:
I took this from one of my projects and compiled the drop, the drop on the song this was originally on didn’t go well transitioning, so I’m using it as a 2nd drop, but for now I need to work on the first one, and I can’t think of any way to make it. I’m looking for either a transition 8-4 bar or a instantaneous Drop. I didn’t want to include the full project because it’s a mess.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/lqWbY7vwj7PvtDGSnPCPRQ==

item.title: Need help with drop, [Future Bass]

item.description:
